thread.title: ANGELIA
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by ANGELIA

author: ANGELIA
title: ANGELIA
text: I was very pleased with my shopping experience. The associate Gladys was very helpful and knowledgeable. She was not pushy or hawkish. She pointed out several options and items that were on sale. She gave wonderful suggestions. I felt comfortable and at ease. I was offered refreshments during my shopping. The paperwork was simple. Also the associate Erica showed great customer service and offered great suggestions. Everyone spoke well of the buyers for the store. Mentioning new items to come. The store had a lot of new items. My delivery will be tomorrow. I'm so excited. I will be shopping at Home Zone again.
